effects.display_string: Set: Phoenix Flames damage increased by 10%. This amount is increased to 25% on its primary target.
Set: After dealing damage, Phoenix Flames has a 10% chance to return to you, refunding 1% of the cooldown on Phoenix Flames and granting you 6% increased spell damage for 10 sec.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Deal yourself in, granting you 7,216 to 8,820 Mastery for 15 sec and stacking the deck. Stacking the deck increases the minimum Mastery on future hands by 267 until you leave combat, up to 3 times. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 6,592 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 173 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Sickle of the White Stag

spells.description:
Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
